name: Gratuity Points
description: Points gifted by viewers in Ghostly Grove. They can be used to redeem rewards from the subscription plan.
story: "How would you evaluate the commercialization of Ghostly Grove?" "Please don't worry, Ghostly Grove may disappear in the future, but it will never lose its essence."

source.description: Obtained by completing investigation requests from the Ghostly Grove
Obtained by completing Exorcismal Chronicle challenges
Obtained by replying to threads or comments on the Ghostly Grove
